attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From companies such as BAE Systems which produces componants for F-16 Fighter Jets used in the recent slaughter of Palestinians (including hundreds of children) to all the leading supermarkets which stock produce labelled as 'West Bank' etc but which are produced by illegal Israeli occupiers on Palestinian land, make our country complicit in the series of atrocities against the Palestinain people in their own land. It is high time the PM, the Foreign Minister, and the rest of the apologists started to take a stance that dared to offend a friend of the USA and take an ethical stand against the abhorant slaughter of innocents and the continued trade with a country that in another name would be condemned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
